data.name: My Jigsaw Adventures - Roads of Life
data.detailed_description:
Get ready for an amazing journey made of jigsaws, driven by a fantastic story!





  • A beautiful story-driven jigsaw game
  • Hand-painted pictures by a professional artist - no photo stock
  • Choose among a selection of shapes: Traditional jigsaw, mosaic or arrow
  • All jigsaws available in 5 different sizes (from 28 to 220 pieces)
  • Set your own difficulty level thanks to customization settings (choose to display the picture or no, display the grid, etc.)
  • Unique music for each puzzle
  • Download the puzzles you completed as wallpaper for your computer.

But that’s not all! Roads of Life also has two game modes to fit your mood. So, are you in for RELAXATION or CHALLENGE?

Standard Mode:

  • Relax, play without timer and get unlimited hints so that you can enjoy your jigsaw activity without pressure.

Challenge Mode:

  • Timer is on! Complete the jigsaw puzzles as fast as you and earn bronze, silver or gold medals.
    You'll earn one hint per jigsaw puzzle you completed.

Check all the My Jigsaw Adventures games in this Collection:

Check and follow Cold Coffee Studio Steam page:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36422902/

data.short_description: Jump into an adventure and travel through fabulous hand-painted jigsaw puzzles! Play the way you want using different number of pieces, shapes and helpers.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You must activate your speaker :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6 or lower
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You must activate your speaker :)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 / Manjaro / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You must activate your speaker :)
  • Additional Notes: Tested & validated by the great r/linuxgaming community
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
